item.content:
I

was born in Bartella a village north of Iraq. I spent my childhood in Baghdad until the war raged on. I was in Iraq until March of 2008, which was when we could no longer stay there because of the dangers that affected both me and my family.

W

e moved to Turkey because of the war. When we were in Turkey, we applied to be refugees in the United States. After nine months, we got accepted and we flew overseas to come to this wonderful place. We arrived to the Untied States a week before Christmas and it was the best christmas that I had in a long time.
